name: Janina WINKLER and Edmund Winkler, her husband, Appellants, v. SEVEN SPRINGS FARM, INC., Appellee
name_abbreviation: Winkler v. Seven Springs Farm, Inc.

judges: Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX, MANDERINO and LARSEN, JJ.
parties: Janina WINKLER and Edmund Winkler, her husband, Appellants, v. SEVEN SPRINGS FARM, INC., Appellee.

casebody.head_matter:
384 A.2d 241
Janina WINKLER and Edmund Winkler, her husband, Appellants, v. SEVEN SPRINGS FARM, INC., Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued March 9, 1978.
Decided April 7, 1978.
Alexander Ogle, Somerset, Seymour H. Braun, C. Joseph Recht, Pittsburgh, for appellants.
C. S. Fossee, Jr., Murovich, Reale & Fossee, Pittsburgh, for appellee.
Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX, MANDERINO and LARSEN, JJ.
